snippet: Jonathan Allen reflects on his first two years at Alabama as total flops, not even worth remembering, much less bestowed with any sense of accomplishment....
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Allen reflects on his first two years at Alabama as total flops, not even worth remembering, much less bestowed with any sense of accomplishment.

headline.main: Column: Great Dynasties Never Have Time to Savor the Moment
headline.print_headline: Column: Great Dynasties Never Have Time to Savor the Moment
